I haven't been smacked in the face this much since my first rumbleseat.
And do you think your pathetic wall will do anything except fall like a heap of dry leaves in the face of?
[speaking Arabic] It was risky to collect leaves, and whenever someone announced that they were going out to bring us food, we knew that they might come back, or they might not.
Just cover me with leaves and tell my mother I died with her name on my lips.
When a body comes out of the water, lots of times there's leaves in the mouth.
